name: Resonance (itch) (Eyon)
description:
Resonance is a game developed during the GlobalGameJam 2017 in Brussels. The theme was: Waves.

We decided to go for sound Waves. In the game the player has the power to produce different kind of sounds. Each sound has the power to move one kind of object and one only. For now we have three types of objects, the player will have to use his power to move the world around him in order to complete each level.

We have three levels for now.

Lead Programer:

Joan Gabriel Florit

https://es.linkedin.com/in/joanflo/fr

Programers:

Adrien Houdart

Lucien Wilmotte

https://be.linkedin.com/in/wilmotte-lucien-5987571...

Antoine Vanlierde

http://www.antoine-vanlierde.com/

Character Design, Environment sprites, UI:

Adrien Houdart

Animations, level design:

Eyon AHO

https://eyonpatrick.wordpress.com/

The game was made using Unity and wwise.

Known bugs:

- Audio is off, we're working on it !
